overview: A film for the whole family! Kinderen van Mavungu (Mirjam Marks) is about the last primary school year of Yoseva, Kenny and Maticha in Pikin Slee, deep in the Surinamese rainforest. A mysterious world full of rituals and forest gods. The main forest god: Mavungu, who watches over the children in this exciting world full of snakes, piranhas and vine swinging. Featuring the voice of musician Typhoon.
title: Kinderen van Mavungu
